name: Real Airport City Air Plane Flight Simulator
name_original: Real Airport City Air Plane Flight Simulator
description:
The most thrilling and exciting airplane flying game is here. Sit in the pilot seat of your passenger aeroplane and fly it to other city. Pick up the passengers from the city airport. Map your destination. Take off for a thrill flight. Fly over the skyscrapers and mountains. And land at the airports located on islands. This passenger plane flying is not an easy task. Flying in extreme weather conditions is a great challenge. For a smooth and safe flight you need to have a good control of the plane.

Experience the fun of real airplane flying with this amazing flight simulator game. Fulfill your job as a pilot by safely transporting passengers from one city to another. Improve your flying skills through extreme flight under hostile weather conditions. Take this plane flying challenge and enjoy the thrilling flight missions.

Get in your Pilot Seat and Fly Safe!
